Welcome to MedDio Diagnosis Chat! How can I assist you today?
Hello! I am here to answer health, disease, and diagnosis-related questions. Please let me know if you have one.

Cancer is a disease characterized by the uncontrolled growth and spread of abnormal cells. These cells can divide rapidly, invade nearby healthy tissues, and in some cases, spread to distant parts of the body through the bloodstream or lymphatic system (a process called metastasis). It typically starts when genetic changes within cells disrupt their normal function and division.
